title: AppMLHTML Includes

metadata.description: Learn about AppMLHTML Includes with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
With AppML, you can include HTML in HTML. Including HTML in HTML A good example of this, is to include a standard HTML footer in all your HTML pages. This is an example of a file containing a standard footer: inc_footer.htm

2016© . All rights reserved.

In this example the appml-include-html attribute is used to include the file "inc_footer.htm": Example Customers

Customers

Customer City Country
{{CustomerName}} {{City}} {{Country}}
★ +1

quiz.question: What is This?
options:
an example of a file containing a standard footer:
inc_footer
quiz.explanation:
The correct definition of This is 'an example of a file containing a standard footer:
inc_footer'.

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this javascript feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

summary: This tutorial covers AppMLHTML Includes concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use AppMLHTML Includes effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of AppMLHTML Includes and how to apply it in your projects.
